title: Eye Care in Ayurveda: Cooling Rituals for Tired Eyes
author: Harish
excerpt: From cucumber to triphala, Ayurveda offers gentle ways to soothe tired eyes and reduce puffiness — especially in a digital world.
content:
Why the Eye Area Needs Special Care

Long screen hours, late nights, and stress strain the delicate skin around the eyes. Ayurveda recommends cooling, nourishing rituals to calm Pitta and refresh ocular tissues.

Cooling Ingredients That Work

  • Cucumber: Hydrating and anti-inflammatory.
  • Triphala: A classical antioxidant Rasayana for eye vitality.
  • Almond oil & shea butter: Nourishing for fine lines and dryness.

How to Use an Ayurvedic Eye Cream

  1. Use a rice-grain amount per eye.
  2. Dab gently using the ring finger.
  3. Apply nightly for hydration and cooling relief.

Digital Age Eye Rituals

  • Follow the 20–20–20 rule.
  • Use rose water pads to cool eyes.
  • Practice palming and blinking exercises.
